column3: Turn the HAR to face the center of the arena
Tells the HAR when to stop walking
Sets object position behind enemy har, used only by chronos' teleport
Tells if the HAR can pass through walls
Block the end of the round
Horizontal screen shake with magnitude n
Animation to play while doing something
Used by jaguar's destruct to move to center of arena
Credits fade effect color start index
Dark tint, used by shadow HAR
Only used by shadow scrap, works with 'bm' tag to walk to far corner of arena
If hit collision succeeds, perform hit pause
Set X axis movement speed, if object is already moving (pixels / frame).
Set Y axis movement speed, if object is already moving. Only works if CX is also set.
Set position to ground and zero velocity
Every HAR uses this in the 'getup' animation, purpose unknown, might be 'grab' (like standing throw)?
Allow chaining to anything? (Katana head stomp)
Allow frame to chain to animation N
Sets angle of new object in degrees. Velocity is then x=cos(ma), y=sin(ma).
Set special Y position for object; y = -4 * (y - 188)
Disable collision detection for the current frame
Set sprite X correction for this frame
Set sprite Y correction for this frame
Enable color effect for HAR palette effects
Switch HAR palette effect handling to the other HAR.
Disable HAR palette effects if HAR is not in damage animation (9)
Effect constant max-value time in ticks (0-127)
Enable hit on current and next n-1 frames.
Play sound N from sound table footer
Prevent sound from playing if other HAR is blocking
Sets enemy HAR to damage animation, if not already set.
Damage enemy if on the ground
Interpolate X coordinate to N by next frame
Interpolate Y coordinate to N by next frame
